text:
Hello all!
I’m new to HubSpot and all it offers, and discovered this slack community via suggestion, hopefully someone can help me figure out my issue. I’ve been given a design to create a landing page for the site, I used one of the landing page templates to start off and then the drag-n-drop interface in HubSpot to add content. I was able to add styles to background colors and some page elements but now I really need to access the html and css of the page I build, and I know there is design tools section in HS but I can’t seem to find how to export my created landing page to design tools to tweak html/css.

Am I missing some step or functionality in order to accomplish that? Hopefully someone here can point me in the right direction.
Thanks!
Hey everyone! Has anyone had any experience building a horizontally scrolling site in HubSpot?

never tried it in HubSpot, but you can always use plugins like:

<https://alvarotrigo.com/fullPage>

<http://scrollmagic.io/examples/advanced/section_slides_manual.html>

which will handle it for you. Personally I don't like it due to the fact you're limited to 100vh for all your content on 1 page so unless it's more of a show page with minimal content, it's not really suitable.
